entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
